statements: UPDATE patents SET approval_date = '2022-04-25', grant_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE patent_id = 101
UPDATE patents SET patent_description = 'Improved technology for solar panels', filing_date = '2022-01-10' WHERE patent_id = 102
UPDATE patents SET patent_title = 'Improved Technology' WHERE patent_id = 1;
UPDATE patents SET patent_description = 'A groundbreaking invention that revolutionizes the industry', filing_date = '2022-01-15', approval_date = '2022-07-20' WHERE patent_id = 3;
UPDATE patents SET filing_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE patent_id = 1;
UPDATE patents SET patent_description = 'Updated description', expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE patent_id = 2;
UPDATE patents SET filing_date = '2022-01-15', expiration_date = '2025-01-15' WHERE patent_id = 123;
UPDATE patents SET patent_name = 'New Patent Name', filing_date = '2022-02-20', patent_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE patent_id = 456;
UPDATE Patent SET filing_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE patent_id = 1;
UPDATE Patent SET inventor = 'Jane Doe', patent_description = 'This is a new description.' WHERE patent_id = 2;
UPDATE patents SET filing_country = 'USA' WHERE patent_id = 12345;
UPDATE patent_authors SET author_name = 'Alice Smith' WHERE author_id = 1;
UPDATE patents SET filing_country = 'USA', inventor_name = 'John Smith' WHERE patent_id = 12345;
UPDATE patent_authors SET author_name = 'Alice Johnson', author_email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE author_id = 1;
UPDATE patent_information SET filing_date = '2022-05-12' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE patent_owners SET owner_address = '123 Main Street, City, Country' WHERE owner_id = 1;
UPDATE patent_information SET description='New description for patent 123', access_level='private' WHERE id=123;
UPDATE patent_owners SET owner_name='New Owner', owner_address='New Address', owner_contact='newemail@example.com' WHERE patent_id=456;
